features.Power: Two deployable sun pointing solar panels generating 220 W power, 105 Ah Lithium ion battery
features.Attitude and Orbit Control System: Star Sensor, Miniature Sun Sensors, Magnetometers Gyros, Miniature Micro Reaction Wheels, Magnetic Torquers, single 1 N Hydrazine Thruster
features.IMS: 1, previously referred to as TWSat (Third World Satellite), is a low-cost microsatellite imaging mission of ISRO (Indian Space Research Organization). प्रमोचन भार / Launch Mass: 83 kg आयाम / Dimension: 0.604x0.980x1.129 m मिशन कालावधि / Mission Life : 2 years शक्ति / Power: 220 W प्रमोचक राकेट / Launch Vehicle: PSLV-C9 / CARTOSAT – 2A उपग्रह का प्रकार / Type of Satellite: Earth Observation निर्माता / Manufacturer: ISRO स्‍वामी / Owner: ISRO अनुप्रयोग / Application: Earth Observation कक्षा का प्रकार / Orbit Type: SSPO (Sun Synchronous Polar Orbit) More Details PSLV-C9 / CARTOSAT–2A CARTOSAT – 2A IMS-1 Brochure PDF - 1.19 MB Orbit Polar Sun Synchronous Altitude 635 km Mission Life 2 years Physical Dimensions 0.604x0.980x1.129 m Mass 83 kg Power Two deployable sun pointing solar panels generating 220 W power, 105 Ah Lithium ion battery Telemetry, Tracking and Command S-band Attitude and Orbit Control System Star Sensor, Miniature Sun Sensors, Magnetometers Gyros, Miniature Micro Reaction Wheels, Magnetic Torquers, single 1 N Hydrazine Thruster Data Handling S-band Data Storage 16 Gb Solid State Recorder More Details PSLV-C9 / CARTOSAT–2A CARTOSAT – 2A IMS-1 Brochure PDF - 1.19 MB
